definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: The fire house is located on Main Street.
sentences.chinese: 消防站坐落在美茵大街。

sentences.english: You crouch on the fire escape, sweating in your dark clothes, staring into this bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 你蹲伏在消防通道上，汗流浃背，观察着浴室。

sentences.english: Instead, they honored him, by adopting the breed as the official firehouse mascot.
sentences.chinese: 相反，他们尊敬它，用它来作为消防队的正式吉祥物。

sentences.english: The curriculum includes a lesson from the firemen on how to rappel from a building.
sentences.chinese: 其中的课程包括消防员教授如何用绳索从大楼上下来。

sentences.english: Bessler's widow offers his possessions to the state.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员的遗孀提供自己的财产交给国家。

sentences.english: The operation of the large ARFF unit was improper.
sentences.chinese: 大型飞机救援消防单位的操作并不适当。

sentences.english: When the fire engines arrived the ladders reached only to the sixth floor.
sentences.chinese: 当消防车赶到，云梯车只能达到到六楼。

sentences.english: The smoke almost choked the fireman.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员几乎被烟熏得透不过气来。

sentences.english: So many firefighters died that day.
sentences.chinese: 那天牺牲了许多消防员。

sentences.english: The driver was ticketed for parking in front of a fire hydrant.
sentences.chinese: 消防栓前而接到交通违规罚单。

sentences.english: A sort of measure and some suggestions of fire system design for business-living building.
sentences.chinese: 关于商住楼消防设计的处理看法及一种设计构想。

sentences.english: A total of 14 fire engines and 66 firefighters were called to the site.
sentences.chinese: 所有的14台消防车和66名消防队员都赶至现场。

sentences.english: A total of 14 fire engines and 66 firefighters were called to the site.
sentences.chinese: 所有的14台消防车和66名消防队员都赶至现场。

sentences.english: There will be a fire drill at Rose Garden School.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰学园将举办一场消防演习。

sentences.english: Mechanic will proceed to the fire pumps rooms to stand by and await further instruction.
sentences.chinese: 机械工应在消防水泵房内待命，等候进一步的指令。

sentences.english: At a signal, the fire men swarmed up the ropes.
sentences.chinese: 一声令下，消防队员们快速轻捷地爬上了绳子。

definition: to dispatch police to the scene of crime, accident etc
traffic police/abbr. for 交通警察
